conbody.p: To add an image, you must do the following:

ul.li: Bundle a root disk image and kernel/ramdisk pair (in some cases, a ramdisk is optional)
Upload the bundled image to Walrus bucket storage

conbody.p: Each image is bundled, uploaded, and registered separately using the Euca2ools commands explained in the following sections.
conbody.note: All users can bundle, upload and register images. However, only an administrator can upload and register kernels and ramdisks. An administrator also manages which images users can access.
